text:
I am sorry if this question isn’t technical enough, but I am struggling with it so hard that I’m hoping there’s someone who can help me out.

I am trying to build a company-based workflow that triggers when a specific meeting is booked. This meeting shows up as an activity on the company record, so this is relatively easy.

From there, I would like to inform 6 external partners that we have received a new lead (this specific meeting is a demo booking). I was thinking I can just send an internal marketing email, but this only works for contact-based workflows and I cannot use that because one meeting might be booked with 2+ contacts from the same company, and then I don’t want to send out the same company as a new lead multiple times.

Is there anybody with a good idea on how to inform external partners in the described situation?
are those partners Contacts in the portal?
<@U033JRJHUVC> do you have these partners in a static list?
That would be no problem to do
